item.title: How can i make it
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

In NPCHandler, go to your monster…

Im gonna use Lessor, for an example.

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 82)//Lesser Demon
{
ItemHandler.addItem(592, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomLesserDemon(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

ItemHandler.addItem(592, npcs[NPCID].absX…

That line, makes it drop ITEMID “592”… When it dies… All the time.
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomLessorDemon()…
Means it will drop a random, out of the method, in Item2.Java.

So this would be that.

    public static int randomLesserDemon()
    {
    	return LesserDemon[(int)(Math.random()*LesserDemon.length)];
    }
